brandcls <- summaryBy(Convenient.mean + Cool.mean + Reliable.mean ~ Cluster, data=brands)
names(brandcls)[names(brandcls) == 'Convenient.mean.mean'] <- 'Convenient'
names(brandcls)[names(brandcls) == 'Cool.mean.mean'] <- 'Cool'
names(brandcls)[names(brandcls) == 'Reliable.mean.mean'] <- 'Reliable'
for (row in 1:nrow(brandcls)) {
  brandcls[row,'Group'] <- paste('B',brandcls[row,'Cluster'],sep=\.\")
